title: Google Assistant Alarm Error
content:
I am trying to set an alarm through the Google Assistant on my phone by saying "Wake me up at..." or "Wake me up in...". I repeatedly get the following error message: "An error occurred while scheduling 1 action, so some actions may not occur when intended."

However, when I try to set alarms by saying "Set an alarm...", it works perfectly. I have tried experimenting on the original issue by trying different times, deleting the data caches, uninstalling updates and restarting the phone to no avail.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
